about_the_game:
Heart of Summer is a dating sim set in a classic anime school setting, just like in your favourite romcom!

Transfer to a new high school and experience your senior year in a new town. You are faced with the excitement of making the most of your last summer as a student, so it's up to you to live it out and try to get that hot, high school girlfriend that you've always wanted! If you can...

FEATURING

  • 5 different GIRLS to DATE!!!

  • 5 different ROUTES to PLAY!!! + numerous BAD endings!

  • Sailor uniforms, miniskirts, loose socks, bloomers, school swimsuits, bikinis, yukatas, maids... something for every taste!!!

A true artistic tribute to the HIGH SCHOOL GIRL AESTHETICA.

EXPERIENCE ANIME SCHOOL LIFE IN THE SUMMER!

  • Get your clothes wet in the rain during the rainy season!

  • Study (or not) for exams!

  • Live out your carefree after school life as a real Go-Home-Clubber!

  • Try not to finish last in the Sports Festival!

  • Feel the heat during the best summer vacation you'll ever have!

  • Go on a SCHOOL TRIP with your class!!

...and much more!!!

The anime school life full of twists and turns is waiting for you; and in this show you're the main character!! This summer, it's going to be hot, sunny and off the wall, so whatever happens, don't think it's going to be that simple: you're about to find out just how serious chasing skirt can be!

Buyer's insurance: even if you cannot get a girlfriend the game studio ©Akehabara GUARANTEES to you a free—yes, FREE—best friend from your class.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
